title: Phone OTP Authentication Success
description: Verify that user can successfully authenticate using phone OTP with valid phone number and OTP within rate limits.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid phone number
Request OTP code
Enter the received OTP code
Submit login form
User is authenticated and redirected to the home/dashboard page

title: Phone OTP Authentication Rate Limiting
description: Verify system enforces rate limiting on OTP requests per phone number and IP to prevent abuse.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Request OTP multiple times exceeding allowed rate limit
Further OTP requests are blocked with an appropriate error message

title: Authentication with Invalid OTP
description: Verify login fails with invalid or expired OTP codes and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid phone number and request OTP
Enter invalid or expired OTP
Submit login form
Login fails and error message about invalid OTP is displayed

title: Add Income and Expense Record - Free Plan
description: Verify user on Free plan can add income and expense records with categories and view them correctly.

steps.description: Login as Free plan user
Navigate to financial records page
Add new income record with amount, category, and date
Add new expense record with amount, category, and date
Both records are displayed in the list with correct details

title: Export Financial Data CSV/PDF - Business Plan
description: Verify that users on Business or Premium plan can export filtered financial records as CSV and PDF accurately.

steps.description: Login as Business plan user
Navigate to financial records page
Apply filters on date range and category
Export data as CSV
Exported CSV contains only filtered records matching UI display
Export data as PDF
Exported PDF document contains accurate filtered financial records formatted correctly

title: Task Creation and Status Update
description: Verify users can create tasks with priority, category, due date and update status correctly.

steps.description: Login to application
Navigate to task management page
Create task with title, description, priority, category, and due date
New task appears in task list with correct details
Change task status to complete
Task status updated and displayed as complete

title: Goal Setting and Progress Tracking
description: Verify users can set goals and track progress visually with indicators updating based on completion.

steps.description: Login to application
Navigate to goals management page
Create a new goal with target metrics
Goal is displayed with progress bar and visual indicator
Update progress on the goal
Progress visual indicator updates accordingly

title: Calendar Event Creation and Reminders
description: Verify users can create calendar events with details, view events in different calendar views, and receive reminders if enabled.

steps.description: Login and navigate to calendar/agenda page
Create new calendar event with title, date/time, description, and optional reminder
Event is visible in day, week, month, and year views
Wait for event reminder trigger time
User receives event reminder notification

title: AI Sub-Agent Interaction - Business Plan
description: Verify AI sub-agents respond correctly to WhatsApp commands for financial management, scheduling, marketing, and development support as per Business plan entitlements.

steps.description: Simulate WhatsApp message to AI financial agent requesting record addition
Agent confirms record added successfully
Simulate WhatsApp message to scheduling sub-agent to create appointment
Agent replies with appointment confirmation
Simulate WhatsApp message to marketing agent with campaign request
Agent provides marketing campaign insights or actions

title: AI Sub-Agent Inactive in Free Plan
description: Verify that AI sub-agent features are inactive or inaccessible for Free and Basic plan users.

steps.description: Login as Free plan user
Attempt to send WhatsApp message to AI sub-agent requesting action
Agent does not perform action and informs user about plan restrictions

title: Support Ticket Creation and Tracking - Premium Plan
description: Verify users on Business or Premium plans can create support tickets, track status, and receive priority handling appropriately.

steps.description: Login as Premium plan user
Navigate to support page and create a new support ticket with subject and description
New ticket appears in user ticket list with correct priority and status
Update ticket status as support staff (simulated)
User sees updated ticket status and receives notification

title: Plan Upgrade Unlocks Features
description: Verify that upgrading subscription plan enables access to new features like dedicated WhatsApp number, export functionality, and AI sub-agents.

steps.description: Login as Basic plan user
Try to access premium feature (e.g., financial export, AI sub-agent usage)
Access is denied, and user is prompted to upgrade plan
Perform plan upgrade to Business or Premium
Access previously restricted feature again
Feature is now accessible without restrictions

title: Backup Execution and Integrity Validation - Premium Plan
description: Verify that data backup tasks run daily for Premium plan users and backups are completed successfully with data integrity confirmed.

steps.description: Login as Premium plan user
Verify backup settings and trigger manual backup (if allowed)
Backup completes without error
Check backup file/data for correctness and completeness
Backup data integrity is validated and no corruption occurs

title: Enforcement of LGPD Consent and Privacy Settings
description: Verify that user consent is required and managed before personal data processing and that privacy options including opt-out are respected.

steps.description: Load application and attempt to use personal data related features
System prompts user for consent before proceeding
User provides consent
User accesses data management and privacy settings page
User exercises opt-out or data deletion where permitted
User data processing respects current consent settings and opt-outs

title: Google Workspace Integration Functionality
description: Verify correct and secure integration with Google Calendar and Drive for event syncing and document handling when enabled.

steps.description: Enable Google Workspace integration for user
Create calendar event in Meu Agente app and link it with Google Calendar
Event appears correctly in linked Google Calendar account
Upload or link document from Google Drive via Meu Agente interface
Document is accessible within the app and permissions are respected

title: Real-time Notification System Functionality
description: Verify that notifications appear in real-time with correct content through bell icon dropdown and user can mark as read or dismiss.

steps.description: Login to application
Trigger sample notifications (e.g., task due, support ticket update)
Notification bell icon indicates unread notifications
Click bell icon to open notifications dropdown
Notifications list is displayed with correct details and timestamps
Mark notifications as read or dismiss them
Notifications update in UI accordingly and bell icon badge updates

title: Dark and Light Theme Toggle Responsiveness
description: Verify that the theme switch correctly toggles between dark and light modes and UI components respond accordingly across devices.

steps.description: Login to application
Locate and toggle the theme switch control
UI colors and components update immediately to reflect selected theme
Resize browser or open on different device form factors
Theme settings persist and UI remains responsive and correct in all viewports

title: Global Search and Filtering Across Modules
description: Verify that global search input returns relevant results filtered properly across financial, task, goals, and calendar modules.

steps.description: Login to application
Enter search query that should match records in multiple modules
Search results include matching items from finance, tasks, goals, and calendar modules
Apply filters within search results to narrow down by category or date
Filtered search results update correctly and align with selected filters

title: Video Content Generation Request - Business Plan
description: Verify that Business and Premium plan users can request video content generation via WhatsApp AI Video agent and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Login as Business plan user
Send WhatsApp message to Video AI agent with video generation request
Agent responds with acceptance and status or completion of video generation

title: UI Responsiveness and Accessibility Check
description: Verify that the user interface is responsive on various screen sizes and meets accessibility standards (e.g., keyboard navigation, ARIA roles).

steps.description: Open application on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
UI layouts adapt gracefully to different screen sizes without overflow or clipping
Navigate UI using keyboard only
All interactive elements are reachable and operable via keyboard navigation
Use screen reader to navigate key pages
UI elements expose correct ARIA labels and roles for accessibility
